channel.title: CVE Feed for PeepSo -- Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PeepSo -- Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles

item.title: CVE-2023-48746|2023-11-30T16:25:31.055Z -- peepso -- community%20by%20peepso%20%E2%80%93%20social%20network%2C%20membership%2C%20registration%2C%20user%20profiles
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PeepSo Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles: from n/a through 6.2.6.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-47850|2023-11-30T11:43:08.567Z -- peepso -- community%20by%20peepso%20%E2%80%93%20social%20network%2C%20membership%2C%20registration%2C%20user%20profiles
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PeepSo Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles: from n/a through 6.2.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-32092|2023-11-09T22:36:18.547Z -- peepso -- community%20by%20peepso%20%E2%80%93%20social%20network%2C%20membership%2C%20registration%2C%20user%20profiles
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PeepSo Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles plugin <= 6.0.9.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-22158|2024-01-31T18:15:01.070Z -- peepso -- community%20by%20peepso%20%E2%80%93%20social%20network%2C%20membership%2C%20registration%2C%20user%20profiles
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PeepSo Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Community by PeepSo – Social Network, Membership, Registration, User Profiles: from n/a before 6.3.1.0.
